Object Position

# Object Position

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                       | Support     |
| --------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
object-bottom
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-center
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-left
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-left-bottom
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-left-top
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-right
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-right-bottom
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-right-top
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-top
```          | 🌐 Web only |
